title: Lesson 10 - One Minute Irish
description: In lesson 10, the final lesson of this series of One Minute Irish, you will learn some useful phrases in Irish like 'cheers', 'happy birthday', and 'I love you' in Irish. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute Irish at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com
